hero_subtitle: From your mobile, in minutes, turn any product into a 3D tour that sells itself. Inmersial makes it possible
product_intro: Inmersial is a solution that allows you to create immersive tours and interactive experiences in virtual reality (VR), augmented reality (AR), and 360°, directly from the web, without apps or downloads, and at a competitive price.
product_1_title: INNOVATION AT THE BEST MARKET PRICE
product_1_desc: Inmersial is a solution that allows you to create immersive tours and interactive experiences in virtual reality (VR), augmented reality (AR), and 360°, directly from the web, without apps or downloads, and at a competitive price.
product_2_title: VISUALS THAT IMPACT. SALES THAT GROW
product_2_desc: Integrate immersive experiences into your website or e-commerce. Captivate your customers and access real-time metrics to optimize every step of the sales process for products, physical spaces, or events.
service_smart_desc: Smart technology at the service of your brand. Analyze metrics and improve user experience.
service_plug_desc: No technical complications: launch your showroom in minutes. Inmersial integrates easily and is ready to use.
service_user_desc: Intuitive navigation. Designed to offer an immersive experience, with no learning curve.
service_cross_desc: Your 360° tour adapts perfectly to mobiles, computers, and VR glasses, with no apps or downloads.
demo_subtitle: Show your products or spaces like never before. Amaze, connect and convert with INMERSIAL
subscription_intro: At INMERSIAL we offer plans adapted to different goals and company sizes, with the freedom you need: No permanence required, competitive prices and scalable features according to your needs
reviews_subtitle: Meet the companies already transforming the way they sell

1.name: FELIPE SEIA
1.title: Game-changing VR technology
1.content: Inmersial completely transformed the way we present our products. Now our customers can experience a vehicle or property in 360°, from anywhere. A key tool for standing out, innovating, and selling more.

2.name: Alina Nowaczek
2.title: Great for work and entertainment
2.content: Immersial transforms the way we sell by offering real-time interactive experiences that build trust, increase conversion, and accelerate decision-making. More than a trend, it's a strategic tool to stand out from the competition.

footer.footer_subtitle: The future of sales is here!
